attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In an age when paedophiles and rapists walk free from prisons with no sense of justice for their victims, we feel that Ronnie Biggs - who never harmed a child or old person, should be released as he has done his time.
The fact that he has had a stroke, has been handcuffed to a prison bed, and voluntarily returned to the UK of his own accord should influence any eventual decision.

rejection.details: This should be taken up with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
